title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: I reckon Riot should just release URF for keeps and also why not try combining game modes for example Hexakill and URF?
if URF was permanent it would make it less special
we are in oce, riot doesn't care bout us ;-;{{champion:32}}
that's so true
They won't release URF as a normal queue as it would increase queue times for other queues, which is why 3v3 is on only at peak times. By doing it this way we all can enjoy quick queues for URF
If URF was permanent it would become so boring and i'd guess people would start finding out exploits/broken strats and it wouldn't be fun, URF is about fun.
when you finally release urf next weekend please dont stuff around with this 11-3 time bullshit. really sucks for us in NZ which is 1pm to 5am
HEY RIOT RIOT RIOT RIOT RITO RITO RITO can you pls make a robot champion? that isnt a support...
Oriana{{champion:61}} and half of viktor{{champion:112}}
The Mecha, Battlecast, Program and Hextech skin sets make people robots.

No one cares about any other game mode then URF .. So much that it should be a standard mode within LOL .. Think of all the new players that would swarm to this if it was a permanent!! We love you Riot, we just love URF more

but then what would the LCS and ranked be for? everyone (including me) would only play URF and there would be no "pros" only OP champs..
in my opinion.

its true that more people would play URF but so what? normals and ranked is horrible anyway i would rather be abused by my team while im spamming spells and having fun then what im experiencing in normals right now.

But, your all missing the main problem, URF _**would**_ become boring after a month or two, it's only so revered because it's rare, hmm whats that quote....
Oh yeah "Beauty fades. That is why it is beautiful." - Lamb {{champion:203}}

well said
{{champion:203}}

Tbh if riot releases urf forever you people do realize that it'll get boring to play eventually because there's only so much that you can do in urf... spamming skills is extremely fun but will get boring after a while, which is why riot is only releasing it for several days.
So angry they released urf on the pbe not even poro king so its been teased all week then the shit on us again with URF
URF is good tho
I'm the only one excited about this, aren't I? {{summoner:3}} fine {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
this mode aint fun
It is.... we all love those adorable little {{summoner:31}}!!!!
Uhh.. Doombots? Please?

I really don't understand why Riot is doing these times;
Friday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Saturday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Sunday 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Why not just make it run all weekend?
That means if you want to play a gamemode you have to stay home all day just to play it. If you go out or have to work on weekends you will basically leave before 11:00 and come back after 3:00. Why is Riot putting limits on the times all of a sudden? This is just restricting certain people from being able to play the gamemodes they love.

mate if you're working from 11 in the morning till 3 in the morning then your hours are  a little fucked up XD. and they have time restrictions on twisted treeline this isn't some new development. its so that queue times don't get fucked up.

Oh wow I was reading 11 am to 3 pm. My bad, but still I dont see the need for restrictions. They have time restriction on twisted treeline because it's barely played, rotating game queues would be played a lot.
RIOT what the hell have some thought about us in Australia and New Zealand these are on school days and not to mention New Zealand cant play til 1 Pm
yay urf on my birthday <3
Happy birthday{{champion:32}}
i wish the game modes would stay on all weekend not just 11am to 3am D:
Poro King? More like Boring King
true that
Poro King is too boring :3 {{summoner:31}}
yea there is nothing to do except stomp or be stomped

make a new que mode and when you find a game everyone accepts then they go to the voting screen instead of straight to champ select and they just vote on what mode they wanna play BAM everyones happy id love to see this in the game but i know it probably wont happen just brain storming

Until ascension wins the vote because the 3 people who queued a premade wanted to play ascension fucking over the other 7 because nothing else got more votes. Your idea only works if there are 2 gamemodes but seeing as there's 7 (to list them off, URF, Ascension, Hexakill, Poro King, Doom Bots, Nemesis Draft, All For One and All For One Mirror Mode) any of them could win with as little as 2 votes. Also one of the gamemodes requires 12 people instead of 10 so good luck with that.
Good points :D
Why isnt U.R.f OUT :((( I HAVE NEVER EVER PLAYED IT BEFORE WHY PORO KING CMON ROIT PLZZZ WE GOT SCHOOL NOW WE NEED URF
poro king is so boring..... it gives us one new spell.... that's it!
BOT OF DOOM. nuf said
YEAHHH I was thinking rito could combine game modes as well..... urf and 1 for all XD
i want urf everyday that will make more people play instead u be dumband pick each year!

I think that Riot should do something like URF every second weekend, and have remove the 11-3 timer, so that OCE can actually play it during the day (seriously what are you doing rito{{item:3070}} ). as it is during the weekend, when more people have time to play league, it wouldnt affect the queue time too badly to have it running constantly. And if its every second weekend, then it probably wouldnt get boring (at least not for a long time) because it only lasts for three days, then you wait another two weeks for it again, having a different gamemode inbetween.
I reckon riot should get more confident in the future to eventually let us have 7 day rotating modes... like Refresh every Friday. or extend it to Tuesday
I really miss snow down showdown, 1v1s and 2v2s they were really fun. I hope they add them back soon.{{champion:32}} _
{{champion:121}} Can kha zix be improved in urf like the jump is more like to be decaresed so their is ifinite 0.9 cooldown jumps plz
BTW, for URF, can we please have the equalizer? it is supposed to be a fun mode and the equalizer would make the game really fun
where is nemisis draft
